name: The Nightmare Catcher
description:
Hello Adventurer welcome to The Nightmare Catcher project, a Sci-fi FPS exploration game, created by the solo developer ⚡XAEON GAMES⚡



The Story

In the year 2050 after the WW3 the Earth loses critical natural elements to maintain life, the world's government decides to create a program called “Humanz 4 Life”, dedicated to bring back hope to humanity, the scientists discover a potential way to farm the extinct elements, but they will need to get access to acouple of samples before testing, an small group of explorers start an interstellar travel to those near planets around the solar system that may contain samples of the missing elements.

During the trip the “Alpha” team, assigned to explore “Kepler 186 F”, gets involved in an accident caused by a primordial black hole, that destroys its ship, they are forced to emergency land on a misterious planet using the scape pods.



Take the control of the astronaut John Perez to explore this mysterious "new" world and its threats, but the most important thing… bring back hope to earth!

Greetings from Mexico! 🛸 Thanks for your support.
